summary: Does what You Think it Does

description: I am glad it exists so don't take next words personal nor so seriouse. I can't add file as attachement and open external link/s but maybe it is on my side. I am using ubuntu and KDE plasma.

Gmail-giu is basically a very stripped-down instance of Chromium browser that loads gmail.com. You can't right click to copy text you've highlighted. Neither can you print an email without closing the entire application afterwards. Closing the print window closes the main window, too. Trying to open an email in a separate window will open a new window, but it remains blank and never loads the content. Many of the links within Gmail either don't work as expected or don't work at all. The two biggest problems are lack of contextual menu support and instance window bugs. If these were resolved, this would be the best Gmail app in the Snap Store.
summary: Does its job...mostly...at a bare bones level
